sql.name: 添加处理器
sql.content: INSERT INTO t_processor(id, machine_box_id, nfc_number, moxa_number, detector_num, creator, create_date) VAlUES (':id', ':boxId', ':nfcNumber', ':moxaNumber', :detectorNUm, ':creator', ':createDate')

sql.name: 通过机箱ID获取处理器列表
sql.content: SELECT p.id, p.machine_box_id, p.nfc_number, p.moxa_number, p.ip, p.detector_num, p.create_date, m.box_number FROM t_processor p LEFT JOIN t_machine_box m on m.id = p.machine_box_id WHERE p.machine_box_id = ':boxId' ORDER BY create_date DESC

sql.name: 通过ID获取处理器
sql.content: SELECT p.id, p.machine_box_id, p.nfc_number, p.moxa_number, p.ip, p.detector_num, p.create_date, m.box_number FROM t_processor p LEFT JOIN t_machine_box m on m.id = p.machine_box_id WHERE p.id = ':id'

sql.name: 根据ID修改处理器
sql.content: UPDATE t_processor SET nfc_number=':nfcNumber', moxa_number=':moxaNumber', detector_num=:detectorNum WHERE id = ':id'
